overview: "Nai Nabhannu La" is a heartwarming Nepali film that tells the story of a young boy named Dhruba, who is orphaned after the death of his parents. The film follows Dhruba's struggles as he copes with his loss and tries to find happiness in life. Along the way, he meets new friends and discovers the importance of love, family, and friendship.
title: Nai Nabhannu La
